query: UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'processing' AND completedAt IS NULL; UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'pending' AND keyword = 'テスト'; UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'pending' AND keyword IN ('重複テスト', 'レポートテスト');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2tBpXYT6QZrXfyp.root --database b2UfL3enjEZB9aUGrDGovx --execute UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'processing' AND completedAt IS NULL; UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'pending' AND keyword = 'テスト'; UPDATE analysis_jobs SET status = 'failed' WHERE status = 'pending' AND keyword IN ('重複テスト', 'レポートテスト');
